author: daxian-dbw
body:
## The second round of adding tab completion tests - issue: #4160 
30 tests are added to improve the test coverage in `CompletionAnalysis.cs`

CompletionAnalysis.cs
- [x] cursor position (you have some of these covered, not sure if all)
- [x] filename after redirection
- [x] line continuation
- [x] DSC resource
- [x] Cursor on special tokens, like comma and minus
- [x] using module <module-name/file-completion>
- [x] Enum property value of DSC Resource
title: Add more tab completion tests
